website_summaries.verdict: The Fasmov doormat is best suited for indoor use, but it is sturdy enough for light outdoor duty. Slate gray color hides dirt well, and the low price point is very appealing.
pros: Sturdy enough for high-traffic indoor areas
Thin profile, will not jam doors or robotic vacuums
cons: Arrives folded or rolled, difficult to lie flat

customer_reviews.title: You need a new packing method!
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing all that special about this mat, and I'm okay with that. I just needed something a bit bigger and more reliable for the entry from my balcony. That's all fine and good except this thing game to me folded 4 times, into 8 sections. The rubber just isn't meant to be folded this way, seriously. It might flatten over time, but these creases are just never going to be quite right and this packing/storage will make this thing deteriorate faster than it needs should. It smells like chemicals but not so overpowering that I can't tolerate it, but I guess that's to be expected. Still... those creases....
customer_reviews.author: Ling

customer_reviews.title: My name is Mat
customer_reviews.text: Great mat which will serve it's purpose. Low profile so it should fit under any door. Came in folded and didn't lay flat at first so I put it in the dryer for a minute on high heat and now there are no folds and it's completely flat. It only took 2 minutes in the dryer, nothing more. Seems very durable and doesn't slip at all. Very satisfied, I'm confident this mat will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: eight1178

customer_reviews.title: Although the mat itself seemed to be exactly what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the mat itself seemed to be exactly what I was looking for in terms of thickness and durability, it was folded in the package and does not lay flat - making the durability moot because now water will pool in it as I have this outdoors. The rubber was stretched with the folding and it is bumpy.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicLitKate

customer_reviews.title: Great floor mat - I bought 2 and our puppy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great floor mat - I bought 2 and our puppy REALLY LIKED them <sigh> Aside from the dog, I was quite pleased with the floor mats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrives creased but it's still worth it!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers said, it does arrive folded and creased, but I let it set out in the sun on a hot day and it straightened right out. If that hadn't have worked, I would have tried the blow dryer tip that someone else mentioned, because it really is a good quality mat, low profile and the cheapest price I could find for a decent product. In fact I want to get another one ASAP for my back door (currently using one at my front door, inside). Also, leaving them it out in the sun helped with the incredibly strong chemical smell it arrived with. If you're willing to deal with uncreasing it, this is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: sturdy & durable as best I can tell
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased, quality seems good, feels heavy & substantial (what I wanted). Works well for scraping shoes before entering the house. I had several "fancy" doormats stolen from my stoop so I hope this "plain" one will last!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they fold it
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this item, but it is folded for delivery. As a result, the mat will not lay flat on the floor, which is a pretty terrible thing for a door mat. I'm hoping it will flatten out, I placed a bunch of books on it. It's frustrating because otherwise is is exactly what I wanted. It's thin enough that if it were to actually lay flat, it would not catch on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fahey

customer_reviews.title: Good Mat, But Was Folded For Shipment
customer_reviews.text: The mat itself is well made, but it was folded for shipment and that distorted (stretched) the rubber boarder. I hope it will flatten out over time. Should have been rolled for shipment: not folded. I would have given it a 5 star if not for the deformity from the folding
customer_reviews.author: Nuke

customer_reviews.title: The condition it arrived in is terrible. There are visible wear and tear already before ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this rug and it arrived in the mail within the hour folded up multiple times and very creased. The condition it arrived in is terrible. There are visible wear and tear already before I have even used this mat. In the pictures shown below you can see the terrible quality. I am not happy at all. Also , I order a gray rug that looks blue.
customer_reviews.author: cliff sauler

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Defective Product!
customer_reviews.text: Two of the mats are stuck to the floor. One is on a concrete stained step on the exterior that is rained upon. The other is on a covered porch and is well protected. Both feel as though they are glued to the surface. After freeing a corner of the mats with a metal scraper I have been unable to pull the mats fron the surface. A third mat was on an exterior step was able to be removed but ripped apart as it was partially stuck. The forth mat is in the home interior will not be used any longer for safety reason. What recourse do we have?
customer_reviews.author: Thomas C. Willingham

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying this rug already. Even though it seldom rains here in Southern California, we have had a couple of storms and the raised tufting on this rug really does a good job of wiping the mud off shoes with deep tread. I am thinking of buying another for my front door too.
customer_reviews.author: Calibrookian

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to this mat. But when I got it it was rolled up tightly sealed in a bag and placed in a box. When I unrolled it, it would not lay a flat. I tried several things such as placing heavy objects on it overnight to using a steamer. It will not lay flat. I thought placing it in the hall may help it flatten. All it did was make people trip. I'm disappointed and I should return but I cut off the tag.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Needed floor mats for my 1989 Chevy Cheyenne pickup. Say hello to my new inexpensive floor mats.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of floor mats to put in my Chevy pickup to help protect the rubber flooring and these door mats fit just right. So now.... they are my new floor mats. These were super inexpensive compared to the ridiculous price being asked for regular pickup floor mats, and, these look great. They are thin enough and pliable enough that they lay flat even where the floor board has minor curves. So I saved some money and got what I wanted. They came in a small box all folded up, but, 30 minutes on the driveway laying in the sun and the creases were gone.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made rubber backing
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase :(. This rug fell apart the first time I washed them and I didn’t even have to put them in the dryer the rubber backing just ripped off in the washer
customer_reviews.author: Love2b777

customer_reviews.title: Too light to stay in place
customer_reviews.text: I hated to give bad reviews, but I don’t recommend this product. It was all folded when I received it, after put it down for weeks, and stepped on it may times, it was still not flat and moved around on the outside hallway carpet. I ended up throwing it away.
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: It is very thin, doesn't stay in place, and comes folded rather than rolled, which means it doesn't lay flat even after putting a heavy box on it. I went to a big box store and found a bigger, thicker, much higher quality mat for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Jan C.

customer_reviews.title: They ugly, but they do the ugly job
customer_reviews.text: These aren't luxury mats, that's coherent with the excellent price. I use them in a a very dusty situation and I have noticed a very welcome improvement in the amount of dust and dirt that I can keep out of the house. They are also comparably thin, so they fit right under two of my very tropical doors, so I can put the rug right after the door and open it without dragging the mat. I know normal US houses don't have this issue because the rug comes before the door, but my tropical house has design issues like these, and these mats adapted very nicely to that.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Pelaez

customer_reviews.title: The mat is nice, the packaging is horrible
customer_reviews.text: They were literally folded over multiple times. It is going to take forever to properly flatten these out.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good Mat!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item back in March of 2017, and during the time it was really wet outside. It was during the week long storm, that when it started, we in CA were in a drought and when it ended, the drought was over (yay!) That is how much abuse there was on this mat day in and day out. Now its late May and the heat is here! The last mat I had melted and stuck the floor. So far this mat is in the same condition that it was when I received it. The pics I attached just now as I am writing this message.
customer_reviews.author: Nixon_TV

customer_reviews.title: Fine for a door that doesn't have heavy traffic
customer_reviews.text: The description on the website said that the matt was grey, and on the screen, it looks grey. But when it arrived its a lot more blue. So colour was not as described on the site. Matt is also smaller than it seems on screen - probably due to the picture angle + the rubber frame around it. Measurements on the site include the rubber frame as part of the dimensions. It's also quite thin. Fine for a door that doesn't have heavy traffic, just not suitable for me due to colour, size and thickness (as its for my main door entrance).
customer_reviews.author: Rozzyn

customer_reviews.title: We have laminate floors that don't particularly like water and every time we'd come in the front ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical upon purchase giving he mixed reviews, but have to say this doormat was exactly what I needed. We have laminate floors that don't particularly like water and every time we'd come in the front door during a storm we'd have to wipe up the water, dirt, and debris. While this might not be a designer may, it was priced right, allowed the front door to clear it, and has kept me from having to keep a towel next to the door to clean up the mess.
customer_reviews.author: thecapn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The mat does not look like the photo. The carpet part is light grey and the entire thing is poor quality and thin.
customer_reviews.author: catem117

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat
customer_reviews.text: While there are prettier/fancier mats to buy, this one is so much better than others. I've bought others that claim to not slide on hard wood flooring and was not the case. This mat absolutely does not slide. It's soft and does a great job capturing dirt on shoes so it's not tracked through the house. I would highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleMG9

customer_reviews.title: I don't think it's good for heavy soil/mud but it works for what I ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I need. The padding has groove to catch dirt and feel soft to the feet (I tend to run around the house bare feet). I am putting it to the door leading to basement. I don't think it's good for heavy soil/mud but it works for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: faye

customer_reviews.title: If it didn’t have a “bump” in the middle of the rug it would be a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a bit disappointed with this. Im not sure if it’s a quality issue or if it’s more to do with the way it was shipped. The rug doesn’t want to lay flat on the floor even after giving it some time to “relax”.
customer_reviews.author: K T S

customer_reviews.title: Locks in dirt
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for two reason. The first, I needed a mat to stop dirt at the garage door, and this was juuust thin enough so it didn't snag like the two other rugs I tried. The second reason being that I needed something to catch my cats spilled food because they are inexplicably messy eaters. This mat keeps cat food in the cat area and not all over the room. Love them and have considered purchasing more for the main and back doors of my home, but I just like a more a decorative look there.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Good  commercial/industrial-looking Mat
customer_reviews.text: What's the difference between a four star doormat and a five star doormat? It took a few weeks for the creases in these mats to disappear. They come tightly folded, and that is evident for several weeks. ... They also aren't the cheapest mats around; They're a good value, but not great. If I found myself near a place that sold these, I could probably find a better value in person.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dreifort

customer_reviews.title: Mat stuck to floor
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in January 2020. They walk off the dirt very well, but when I wanted to move them to clean up the floor it stuck to the floor. I was unable to pry it loose. The mat came apart while trying to get it up! It even pulled some of the paint off of my garage floor. And the paint has been there for many years! Going in the trash, as least what is left of it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good for office purpose
customer_reviews.text: This must be good for office, I didn't like it for home.
customer_reviews.author: Ganesh Chandra

customer_reviews.title: Cheap. Stay away
customer_reviews.text: 13.99 what a joke. Thought this was nicer but when it came its about a 4.00 mat from the dollar store. Stay away from this one.
customer_reviews.author: pauljohnsen

customer_reviews.title: This rug seems like it'll hold up pretty well
customer_reviews.text: This rug seems like it'll hold up pretty well. It's in the garage for my husband to destroy but he hasn't yet. Lol. One of my children spilled juice on it and I rinsed it off with water and hung it to dry. It dried pretty fast and I put it back in the garage to decrease the dirt everyone brings in. It's pile sticks up enough to be rugged enough to get mud off nasty boots.
customer_reviews.author: Word

customer_reviews.title: Thin, small with fold marks
customer_reviews.text: This Matt is very thin and small. It is not really suitable for outdoor use. It comes folded many times into a small square so it will not lay perfectly flat. The fold marks are quite noticeable. Most outer doors are 36 inches so this Matt does not come close in covering the opening. Really flimsy product.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Okay mat for the price, but didn't suit my needs.
customer_reviews.text: It's very flimsy and slides around on my tile floor. They should really roll the mats instead of folding them so they will lie flat out of the box. It's not bad for the price but just be aware this isn't a heavy, non-slip mat.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Shoponline

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: These rugs are a good size for what I needed, a rug large enough to hold a couple pairs of shoes by the front and back door. I use them inside, they move a bit on the carpet, but the one on the tile stays in place. Easy cleaning, I haven't gotten them too dirty yet, but my vacuum goes right over them and picks up any debris that was tracked in on my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my backyard game
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to finish off a homemade backyard game. The first one I purchased had a very toxic smell, but I had already cut into it before I realized the unbearable nature of the smell. I purchased it a 2nd time and the 2nd one I received had ZERO smell and flattened out very quickly. Worked perfect for my use - just a basic doormat!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Simple and it Works
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this product is very good. Because it's on a sort of cobbled type of pavement outside my place, the bottom of the mat doesn't adhere as much as I think it would if it were on a flat piece of surface like solid wood or linoleum. It moves a bit, but that isn't a bad thing as the surface is great for the shoes I've got, and definitely something I'd buy again when the time came.
customer_reviews.author: Auricom

customer_reviews.title: Strong Smell and Creases.
customer_reviews.text: Plain, simple, and effective. It comes neatly wrapped. Once you open it, prepare yourself for a strong chemical smell that won't go away for a few days. I sprayed it with a garden hose and dunked it in soapy water to help get rid of the smell. I let it air out for a couple of hours. It helped get rid of the creases, but a bit of the smell is still there. Besides the smell and the creases, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Denis M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Product for the price of 12.99 was very thin and very wrinkled! I expected more1!
customer_reviews.author: Martin K. Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Not has heavy, or sturdy, as I'd hoped. It hasn't moved around, but it doesn't feel like it will handle very much wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Doe

customer_reviews.title: the mat looks horrible and doesn't lay flat
customer_reviews.text: Arrived permanently scored from the seller folding it, when they should have rolled it instead. Now, the mat looks horrible and doesn't lay flat, which prevents it from adhering to the floor and providing its intended purpose. Horrible and going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Do they make these in a 3' by 5'?
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the front door. I was worried, because the last entrance rug I found was too thick - so much so that the door couldn't open without pushing the rug. This one is thinner, but that does not mean it isn't durable. This handles my Doc Martens without a problem. I wish I could get a small area rug made out of this stuff - that way I could cover the floor of the entire vestibule.
customer_reviews.author: Darren B.

customer_reviews.title: Thin and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fits great under my security screen door. I like that it's thin and seems sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Not A Bad Choice When It Comes To Utilitarian Doormats
customer_reviews.text: They're not the prettiest of mats, but they do a pretty good job of keeping the mud and dirt out of the house, though they slide a bit more on the linoleum tile than I'd like. But they seem durable enough after five months of scrubbing the soles of the shoes and boots and dog and cat paws that trample all over them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Lay it in the sun to get the folds out
customer_reviews.text: They are a little thinner than I hoped, but still nice for the price. Nothing fancy here. Just a matt for my mudroom. Mine came folded but if you lay it in the sun for a couple hours it will flatted out just fine...
customer_reviews.author: fleshnuget

customer_reviews.title: Do the job
customer_reviews.text: When arrived, there was a sticky residue on the mat that was difficult to remove. We keep them outside so it wasn’t that big of a deal, just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Super nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put on the inside of our sliding back door. Super nice. Collects the snow and dirt off the shoes and dogs paws coming back in. Will probably buy more. Especially if they make a larger size
customer_reviews.author: D.hogan

customer_reviews.title: It's a really boring floor mat
customer_reviews.text: It's a really boring floor mat, but it works. When it showed up, it was curled and I was worried it wouldn't flatten out. That wasn't a concern. It is now perfectly flat. It doesn't slip and slide around either. It has been reliably protecting my apartment's door for quite awhile now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rubin

customer_reviews.title: so it could do a better job with that
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about this mat. When I wipe my shoes on it, I'm still tracking in dirt/sand, so it could do a better job with that.
customer_reviews.author: lovespups

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rug
customer_reviews.text: I like this rug, we have it sitting in the living room right in front of the balcony door, that way people can wipe their feet before walking through the place. It doesn't skid around, and it's made of sturdy, quality material. It helps in wiping dirt, snow, etc. off of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: StephG

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to trap dirt from the garage since my husband has a lot of metal shavings and dry sweep. It has helped SO MUCH. Captures a lot. I just take it to the big trash can out side and shake it and put it back where it needs to go. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great Rug, Great price
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our old rug in the garage with this. Wanted something absorbent, but also with the grooves to get dirt off of shoes. This rug fit both of my needs, and at a great price. I recently did the Rustoleum Polycuramine garage floor epoxy, and this doesn't slip and slide. Stays where I put it. Everything I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MTH

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product! Ships folded and is unusable.
customer_reviews.text: This floor mat which seems like a quality product is shipped severely folded by the manufacturer (not by Amazon) and when unopened is uneven and lumpy and won't fit under my door which defeats the purpose. Until the manufacturer can start packaging these rolled I would avoid ordering this from Amazon and getting one at your local brick-and-mortar store.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Boots

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Entrance Rug
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable. We're in the country and everything comes in the back door. Especially mud. This mat does a great job and is easy to clean. Very happy with this choice.
customer_reviews.author: charliegirl

customer_reviews.title: Just a doormat - ok
customer_reviews.text: Came folded and the folds took 3-4 days to flatten out outside. Really would have preferred if it came rolled. Other than that, it's a cheap doormat. Does its job, I suppose. Seems ok.
customer_reviews.author: jclflorida

customer_reviews.title: YOU WON'T TRIP OVER IT, BECAUSE IT IS NOT TOO THICK.
customer_reviews.text: THE OTHER REVIEWERS WERE CORRECT. THE MAT COMES FOLDED INSTEAD OF ROLLED. I ORDERED IT ANYWAY BECAUSE IT WAS THE RIGHT HEIGHT AND COLOR. I USED MY BLOW DRYER TO EASE OUT THE FOLDS. NOW IT LAYS FLAT. IT LOOKS PERFECT IN THE FOYER, JUST OUTSIDE MY BLACK APARTMENT DOOR.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmom

customer_reviews.title: Works as Good as Any Ole Mat
customer_reviews.text: This mat does its job. I have it in my room (hard tile floor) at the foot of the door that leads to my back yard. Only thing is, it take a few days for the rubbery (not that pleasant) smell to dissipate. I can't really knock it down too much for that, but it is still a rather small nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Huge creases.
customer_reviews.text: This mat came in a box all folded up in plastic. It looks horrible and does not lay flat. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela M. Mazahreh

customer_reviews.title: Kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight! And didn't stick well to our wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Mem427

customer_reviews.title: Quality home door mat
customer_reviews.text: Works well, more or less what I expected. It's the same kind of thing as the generic mats you see at businesses, made thinner and smaller to fit a home door. It seems slightly flimsier than I expected, which I found disappointing, but honestly I'm not having any issues with it so I guess it doesn't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: This is the thinnest doormat I've ever seen. So thin in fact it was folded into eighths to fit into the shipping envelope. I was unsure it would ever lay flat and also not sure it wouldn't blow away so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel E

customer_reviews.title: Best door mats for the price
customer_reviews.text: These mats are way better than anything you would get at Wal-Mart for the same price and actually full sized.
customer_reviews.author: CDizzie

customer_reviews.title: Good Mats!!!
customer_reviews.text: These mats are great, but you must unfold them for several days before they lay flat, no worries ... they are VERY STURDY and we really like them. One for the house and one for the travel trailer!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: My husband does manual labor for a living and tracked dirt through our house. While this mat didn't eradicate this problem, it cut the dirt in half.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C.

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of mothballs
customer_reviews.text: This might be a nice product if you don’t mind that it’s been opened and re-taped and smells so intensely of mothballs that everything else unfortunate enough to be packaged with it in the box (edibles, poor choice, Amazon) was also was ruined by the stink.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It's a rug. It cleans off dirty shoes, was easy to brush and/or sweep off and was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: A. Shultz

customer_reviews.title: and it works great. I have a huge grass bur / sticker ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it came folded up into a little square, but I just unfolded it, and stuck it on my deck, and it works great. I have a huge grass bur / sticker problem. This seems to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: RPF

customer_reviews.title: Not fussy, just disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for a project I'm working on and clearly they are different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Drago

customer_reviews.title: Inferior product
customer_reviews.text: These doormats are so cheapLy made! They are extremely thin, no absorbency, keep blowing off my porch because they are so lightweight. What a crappy product. Do not buy these if you want any kind of quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Hardy

customer_reviews.title: does what it is supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a basic door mat to help prevent salt begin tracked in with winter weather as I have young twins who are crawling around. This catches a lot of the stuff I don't want being tracked in (dirt, salt, leaves, ect...)
customer_reviews.author: lrn0216

customer_reviews.title: No more mud inside
customer_reviews.text: Just moved into a new house, the driveway to the back door is very muddy and we were tracking it in. This mat is great at grabbing the dirt off our shoes. Once it's dried I just sweep it off. Job well done!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am pleased with this mat
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am pleased with this mat. It seems to be good quality at a good price. I've had no problems with it sliding around or edges rolling up etc. I only wish it were several inches larger in each direction & would have given it 5 stars if it had been. I can only describe the size as being adequate but less than ideal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Martha R.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, color is more blue
customer_reviews.text: No complaints, this is good quality for the price! Just one thing to note, the color is much more of a denim blue than pictured. It also smelled super chemical-y when I first opened, but I’m sure that will go away in a couple of days. Neither of those things bothered me!
customer_reviews.author: Macy McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Good simple mat
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my room clean, and very easy to dust off outside. Collects all the crap on my shoes. Only thing is that the picture looks all black but there's a bit of blue.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Very well made entrance mat!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced 2 worn mats that I have situated in front of 2 sliders to the backyard, and these replacements are so superior. They stay in place perfectly and are easy to clean. I highly recommend these mats!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Somes

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This do not move on my floors during heavy traffic love the rubber on the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Inga Barrington

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This mat came in the mail yesterday. I was not expecting it to come folded up two ways, so it needs to be walked on or have some weight on it for it to "unfold" and be properly flat. Other than that, it's okay. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ming Nim

customer_reviews.title: Great rugs I enjoy them
customer_reviews.text: Great rugs I enjoy them. My only problem is you can't grab them and shake them because the side rubber around around will pull away from the drug itself.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great rugs at a great buy and very easy to clean. I used them at my front entrance to keep down tracking dirt and I must say I am very very impressed. Looks just like picture Fast shipping as well
customer_reviews.author: Frances Price

customer_reviews.title: bought this for our mud room and it's great at wiping your feet on
customer_reviews.text: bought this for our mud room and it's great at wiping your feet on, and stays in place really well while doing so. Perhaps a little bit of a hassle to clean itself, but I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: These rugs are exactly what I wanted/needed and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: momof2

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These matts are very nice! Was looking for something inexpensive, when they arrived I was surprised at the quality
customer_reviews.author: Sutiikare

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product several months ago and haven’t been overly impressed. First off, it was much smaller than I expected. I understand that’s mainly my own fault for not actually measuring, but i was expecting bigger. It also came with a not so pleasant smell and does not hold its place on the ground. As soon as you step on it, the matt starts to slide. It’s also very thin, so I’m not sure there’s much water/dirt absorption happening here. After a bit of use, it sticks less and less to the point where I’ll probably have to replace it. Cheaply made, and wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dan88

customer_reviews.title: Best used outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Material Better suited for outdoor than indoor use. Little tough. Gets dirt off boots and shoes well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basic doormat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect basic doormat. Can go outdoors in dry weather. Vacuumes and washes well. It comes with significant fold bumps, but they flatten out within 10 days.
customer_reviews.author: Finder of Interest

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great mat! Reflects price, but still does a great job and stays in place. I would buy again. Yes, it is light weight, but I don't know why people are complaining about it. It's a door mat & a cheap one, what do you expect... If you're looking for a fancy doormat buy another one. I bought this to literally wipe my feet on and it works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what i need it to do.
customer_reviews.text: Its the perfect thickness for my door to go over it with no issues and catches dirt very well. I didnt like how it was packaged folded. I bought two and both took a couple of days to relax and lay flata. Rolled would have been better
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: You can actually wipe your feet on this map without it slipping around. The softer surface is more functional than the higher priced, thicker and stiffer mats.
customer_reviews.author: D. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Great for condos and catching bird seed!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for our porch. We live in a condo on the second floor and wanted 2 to keep the bird seed from our bird feeder. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Worked nicely and good qualuty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend as a kind of joke because him and his roommates tracked so much crap in from outside into their house; the floor was soaked and covered in salt all winter long. This was amazing and they totally loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very low pile.  Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. I wanted a front-door rug that low pile to fit when the door swings open. This fits perfectly and looks great. It arrived folded up, which was a surprise, but it flattened out quickly. Hope it wears well!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Practical rug
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rug at our back door where we drag in lots of outdoor "stuff". Works well and looks OK too.
customer_reviews.author: Elphy 2

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: A nice rug to wipe your feet on if you’re like me and hate dirt. Not super stylish but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Nice rug
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It looks simple but not cheap. Does it’s job, very durable and easy to vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Molinari

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Have this in my house in front of the front door. Not sure I would use it outside but it works well to get some extra dirt off the shoes before going into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan R Gehr

customer_reviews.title: Great mat, perfect size
customer_reviews.text: After slipping and falling on my tile floor because my shoes were wet, this mat is exactly what I needed. It’s the perfect size for the inside entrance of my house.
customer_reviews.author: Lucychas

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Comes packed folded over a few times so put one in the dryer on high for 2 minutes and it will lay out flat perfectly. ONLY PUT ONE IN THE DRYER AT A TIME. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Evans

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful rug. Very well-made
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful rug. Very well-made. Works out very well when coming in from outdoors to remove the dirt from their shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received my mats today. They were folded as others ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my mats today. They were folded as others have said in these reviews. Rubber responds to heat so I threw them in my dryer for about 10 minutes. Creases gone and they lay flat. Now to see how they work with wet and snow covered boots.
customer_reviews.author: Marlyne Natali

customer_reviews.title: Good mat.
customer_reviews.text: This mat is what I wanted for my front entrance, but it is very slippery on the tile. I washed it (seemed like there was a layer of oil on the bottom) and I added some ShoeGoo for added anti-slip.
customer_reviews.author: Christine D

customer_reviews.title: Very "light weight"
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light weight door mat, slight wind moves it. If you want a disposable door mat this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D.

product_meta.title: Fasmov 2 Pack Indoor Outdoor Entrance Rug Floor Mats Shoe Scraper Doormat,20”x31.5”(Gray)
feature_bullets: Use on a patio, in a garage, laundry room, entryway, and anywhere there is high traffic from outside
Can be easily cleaned by shaking, sweeping or hosing off, and easy back to original shape
Made of high quality polyester and rubber, non slip rubber backing prevents moisture from seeping through and keeps the mat in place
Long lasting and biodegradable, Patent pending & copyright protected

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars627 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
